Name: European Quality of Life 5-Dimension (EQ-5D)
Description: Mean percent change from baseline in EQ-5D score

Name: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire: Psoriasis  (WPAI: PSO)
Description: Mean change in WPAI domain scores

Name: Treatment-emergent Adverse events
Description: Frequency and incidence rate of any TEAE by SOC, PT, severity, and relationship of adverse events (AEs) to investigational product  (IP).
Timeframe: During double-blinded treatment and throughout the duration of the apremilast treatment

Name: Clinically significant changes in body weight, waist circumference, vital signs, and/or laboratory findings
Description: Frequency of clinically significant changes in body weight, waist circumference, vital signs, and/or laboratory findings.
Timeframe: During double-blinded treatment and throughout the duration of the apremilast treatment

Name: Static Physician Global Assessment (sPGA) of Visible locations
Description: Proportion of subjects who achieve sPGA score of 0 or 1 (among subjects randomized with moderate to severe psoriasis in visible areas, defined as sPGA ≥ 3, which include the dorsal hand, face, neck, or hairline)

Name: Scalp Physician Global Assessment (ScPGA)
Description: Proportion of subjects who achieve ScPGA score of 0 or 1 (among subjects randomized with moderate to severe scalp psoriasis, ScPGA ≥ 3)

Name: Nail Psoriasis Severity Index  (NAPSI)
Description: Proportion of subjects who achieve NAPSI score of 0 in the target fingernail (among subjects randomized with presence of nail psoriasis, defined as onycholysis and onychodystrophy in at least 2 fingernails)
